overview: Thi is responsible for overseeing website operations, technology and product development for ExpoTV. Prior to ExpoTV, she was a Product Manager at Amazon.com in their books, music and DVD division. Previously, Thi held business development and strategic planning roles at Oxygen Media. She has also worked at Warner Music Group and in the media investment banking group at Morgan Stanley. Thi holds a Masters in Business Administration from Harvard Business School and a Bachelor of Arts in Applied Mathematics from Harvard College.
